Title: Star Trek: First Contact
Writer: Gene Roddenberry (television series Star Trek), Rick Berman (story), Brannon Braga (story), Ronald D. Moore (story), Brannon Braga (screenplay), Ronald D. Moore (screenplay)
Actors: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner, LeVar Burton
Plot: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 20 nominations.
